title: Traptrix Atrax

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Tie up one player in string; their action as well as any action visiting them fails tonight, and any player visiting them gets notified "Your target was covered in string!"
- Target one player; play a random trap hole on them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If this role is currently alive, every Traptrix role gains the additional attribute "Your ability(s) cannot fail".

desc:
Post 2943
*Would you like to taste our venom?*
